name: Who's There (Server)
description: A component of the Who's There sample video calling service.

OPENTOK_KEY.description: A Project API Key from your TokBox Account

OPENTOK_SECRET.description: The Project API Secret from your TokBox Account

FIREBASE_URL.description: The Firebase Database URL for your Firebase Project

FIREBASE_SERVER_KEY.description: The Firebase Cloud Messaging server key for your Firebase Project

FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT.description: The Service Account JSON data for your Firebase Project
